name: Slime's Homecoming
description:
Two slimes having been lost in the wild have found themselves in an underground room separated from the world. Not knowing how to get back to dry land, they venture into rooms to find their way back to freedom. Discover Slime's Homecoming, a small platform puzzle game in which you play as Blue and White! And overcome multiple obstacles mixing riddles and platformers!

Key to use - W A S D for left section and Arrow keys for the right section

liluo.io - https://liluo.io/thecoder007/theslimegame
